statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content: soda has a set $S$ with $n$ integers $\{1, 2, \dots, n\}$. A set is called key set if the sum of integers in the set is an even number. He wants to know how many nonempty subsets of $S$ are key set.

statement.title: Input
statement.content:
There are multiple test cases. The first line of input contains an integer $T$ $(1 \le T \le 10^5)$, indicating the number of test cases. For each test case:

The first line contains an integer $n$ $(1 \le n \le 10^9)$, the number of integers in the set.

statement.title: Output
statement.content: For each test case, output the number of key sets modulo 1000000007.
